title: What's this font called?
content:
Hi peeps,

Anyone know what this font is called?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_3703.png)

 [‹ request for well-kerned text samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43246 "Go to previous forum topic") [Cast your vote for the best Mac OSX font manager ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5563 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Timid_and_friendly

comments.content:
Thanks very much.

One more question... do you happen to know the name of this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/285_5901.png)

Hi David,  
please start a new thread for every query. That, and an accurate title, will help you getting a quick answer, and help others finding back things. (see [FAQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151/http:/www.typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq))  
And please use the [Type ID forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906165151/http:/www.typophile.com/forum/29) for this kind of requests.

Thanks, F
